meanings.definition: The male head of a family or household.
meanings.sent1: The paterfamilias made important decisions for the family.
meanings.sent2: The paterfamilias taught his children valuable life lessons.
meanings.sent3: The paterfamilias tried to fix the broken toaster with a hammer.
meanings.sent4: In the jungle of the office, he was the paterfamilias guiding his team through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The paterfamilias' deep voice echoed through the house, commanding attention.

meanings.definition: A man who is the oldest or most powerful member of a group.
meanings.sent1: As the paterfamilias of the village, he was respected by all.
meanings.sent2: The paterfamilias of the gang always had the final say.
meanings.sent3: The paterfamilias of the book club organized a surprise party for the members.
meanings.sent4: He stood tall like a paterfamilias among his peers, exuding authority.
meanings.sent5: The paterfamilias' presence filled the room, commanding admiration from everyone.
